entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 08:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -30.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -34.6°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
